tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (JJ Happy) (NN weekend)) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP you)))) (NP (NP (NN party) (NNS people)) (, ,) (CC and) (NP (NP (JJ happy) (NNP Monday)) (PP (TO to) (NP (PRP me)))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [weekend/NN amod>Happy/JJ nmod:to>[you/PRP case>to/TO] dep>[people/NNS compound>party/NN punct>,/, cc>and/CC conj:and>[Monday/NNP amod>happy/JJ nmod:to>[me/PRP case>to/TO]]] dep>Monday/NNP]
